boardgame.name: Too Many Bones
boardgame.description: Too Many Bones comes loaded for bear by breaking into a new genre: the dice-builder RPG. This game takes everything you think you know about dice-rolling and turns it on its head. Dripping with strategy, this fantasy-based RPG puts you in the skin of a new race and takes you on an adventure to the northern territories to root out and defeat growing enemy forces and of course the infamous _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;baddie_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; responsible._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Team up or go it alone in a 1-4 player Coop or Solo play campaign. With over 100+ unique skill dice and 4-7 classes to choose from, every battle is its own mini challenge to figure out. Your adventure will consist of 8-12 battles before you reach your final destination and face off against one of a number of possible kingpins in order to win. Along the way, you will be faced with storyline decisions that will quickly have you weighing risk/reward, odds, and logic - with dice woven into every aspect! Your party will also be faced with other decisions: when to rest, when to explore, or even which fights to pursue! The Encounter cards offer fun plot twists and some comic relief, all while setting the stage for your next battle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

The original dice builder RPG! You and up to three other players are Gearlocs. Your homeland has been invaded by seven savage Tyrants, and the Gearloc Council has summoned you to defeat them. Draw daily encounters filled with tough decisions and battles as you make your way to the Tyrant’s lair. Discover powerful Loot and Trove Loot to help you on your way. Build your character and unlock new dice to roll as you take down unique Baddies, each with their own special abilities and traits. Loaded with content for solo and coop play, Too Many Bones comes with 136 custom dice, beautiful neoprene mats, PVC cards and dozens of high quality chips. The seven Tyrants employ their own special encounters and a unique final battle that will put all your skills to the test. Each of the four Gearlocs come with 21 custom dice, numerous character build options and completely unique gameplay mechanics and skills. This a game you’ll bring back to the table to try something new again and again. Included in this listing is the following: Core Game Adventure Mat Premium Health Chips Control Your Roll Dice Tray Add-on Characters: Ghillie Nugget Tink Please add £27 postage for tracked delivery via DPD.
1st edition that also include Ghillie, Tink _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Nugget Buyer pays shipping. Be aware shipping will be very expensive, this is a VERY heavy game!

The original containers for the add-on characters are not included but all of their pieces and parts fit in the original game box. So overall complete except for the one missing health chip.

This is a 1st Ed TMB upgraded to 2nd Ed, with several extras. In parentheses, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve included the price of each item on CTG_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s website. What you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll get: - Too Many Bones, 1st Ed ($125) - 2nd Ed Upgrade Box (includes new rulebook, reference sheets, some updated cards and token faces) ($9) - Adventure Map ($15) - Add-on Character Tink ($25) - Add-on Character Gillie ($25) - Add-on Character Nugget ($25) - Control _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Ur Roll Dice Tray ($15) - 3x chip organizing trays (3x$5) - Promos: (priceless?) 1x Promo 001: The Great Gathering 2x Promo 002: Box of Endless Adventures 1x Promo 003: Forbidden Gems 1x Promo 004: Book of Secrets So, this all would come out to $254 if you were getting it from the CTG store. Everything is in excellent shape, except the bottom tray has a little hole on one side that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve taped over. The insert is fully functional, and the hole is not very noticeable. This is how it arrived, and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a common problem with 1st and 2nd Ed inserts (I guess the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;hearty drop test_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; CTG used to test their improvement in the 2nd ed insert wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t much of a test, ha!). For more details: [thread=1781509][/thread] [thread=1829452][/thread] I have the game in hand and will ship it as soon as I receive payment. The shipping charges are your responsibility. I have everything in the main box, but I will include all other boxes the above items came in.

This is for second edition of Too Many Bones and all the add-ons I have for it. Game will come with: - 3 add-on characters: Nugget, Ghillie, and Tink. All 3 still in shrink. - Adventure map - full set of upgraded health chips - 2nd edition upgrade pack (received by accident when I got my KS copy of Triplock for some reason; essentially extra copies of a bunch of cards, an extra packing tray, 2 boxes for cards, and a set of player mats) - extra dice tray One of the box chip trays has a crack, came in like that shipped, seems they put some pressure on the sides of some of the boxes and the trays cracked. Seems to be a common problem. Visual defect only, all chips still fit great and snug without any gluing. Just as a heads up, the whole package is pretty hefty so it might cost a bit to ship. One downside to literally hundreds of dice, I guess!

I have played the game 6 times, but all game components are in like new condition due to the high quality components. The box is in very good condition, some minor creasing and a small ding on one corner that came as a factory preset. There were some component issues which were replaced by CTG, the exception being some color variation among encounter and loot cards - apparently this is very common and CTG declined to replace these cards. The cards are still easily legible, they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re just slightly different tones. Nothing is missing - All mats, dice, cards, chips, and tokens are complete. Buyer pays shipping from 30269 (approx 12 pounds) - max $25 (I will pay any excess over $25).

From Auction for User mbourgeois Please do not purchase unless you are this User I have a very good condition copy of: ---Too Many Bones Base Game ---Nugget Character Expansion All dice, character sheets/mats, cards, chips, etc, are in very good condition. I take care of my games. The rulebook staples did decide to let go of a few pages, which was annoying, but otherwise it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in great shape. This game has a TON of dice, very cool/fancy chips for enemies/bosses/characters, and a very neat choice system for your adventures and progression of your characters. There is a lot of reading and checking the character sheets for each character on which dice do what, what to upgrade your character with, what different symbols mean, etc. However, it will start making sense after about 1 to 2 games. (I did, however, play this game with 4 characters by myself, so that did multiply the amount of information I had to wrap my head around for all the different abilities, and upgrade path for each character). This was a really unique experience in playing this game, and I had a lot of fun. Now it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s time to pass it on to the next gamer for them to enjoy! Please let me know if you have any questions, and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be happy to answer them for you. For shipping, the price includes FREE SHIPPING in Canada!!! I can include the empty Nugget Character Expansion Box if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like, but all of the items will be stored in the main box.
